amendment.description: Amendment sought to narrow the permissible exemption to allow oral or written communications with potential investors who are qualified institutional investors but would omit accredited investors from the exemption in the name of investor protection.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-409 to strike language that allows an emerging growth company or its underwriter to communicate with "institutions that are accredited investors.".

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
